content.rendered:
Careers

Join in our pursuit of audio and video perfection

We’re building APIs to solve critical communications, media, and streaming challenges. Help us deliver high-fidelity audio and video experiences to all.

Explore open roles
Featured opportunities

Engineering

Dolby.io Solutions Engineering

The Senior Solutions Engineer will be the technical expert that works with our existing and prospective high-value customers. You will keep your skills…

  • Full-time

San Francisco
Engineering

Senior Software Engineer in Test

As a Senior Software Engineer in Test, you will join our fast-growing Dolby.io group, collaborating with talented engineers as part of a high-impact team…

  • Full-time

Sydney
Product

Director API Communications Products

This key Director-level opportunity will serve as a senior leader focused on building real-time communications and streaming APIs/SDKs. You will bring…

  • Full-time

San Francisco
Engineering

QA Engineer

We are looking for an experienced QA Engineer – You will help us to improve the quality of software that enables the next generation of Dolby technologies…

  • Full-time

Wroclaw
Marketing

Sr. Product Marketing Manager, Media

As the Sr. Product Marketing Manager, you will design and own the go-to-market strategy for the audio and video APIs to drive awareness, preference, adoption…

  • Full-time

San Francisco, Los Angeles
View all positions

What we do

With decades of industry expertise under our belt, we know a thing or two about high-quality audio and video. Dolby.io is a new, self-service developer platform that puts Dolby technology straight into the hands of innovators through the power of APIs and SDKs. Developers are using the Dolby.io platform to create social applications, virtual classrooms, high-fidelity podcasting solutions, telehealth applications, live and on-demand webinar solutions, virtual meetings and events, and much more. Our award-winning Media APIs enhance the quality of audio and video files while our Communications and Streaming APIs make it easier than ever to add voice, video, streaming, and many other interactive capabilities to apps to create spectacular experiences. 

Who we are

Our team is made up of incredible individuals who are experts in their respective fields. We care deeply about the customer and developer experience, love what we do, and try to have a good time doing it. We also love a good challenge. We believe that in order to achieve the incredible, we have to attempt the impossible. At Dolby, you’re given the resources, latitude, and support needed to stretch your imagination and reach great heights.

Make an impact

You’ll be right at the heart of major projects, working with teams of passionate people and helping to create the next immersive experience in audio and video technology. Forget the busy work. You’ll be contributing and directly impacting the business. But you won’t have to do it alone. We believe that true teamwork and collaboration fuel extraordinary results.

Every voice matters

We’re committed to being a part of creating a more diverse and inclusive world of belonging. Different backgrounds, perspectives, and beliefs foster new ideas and bring critical value to our business — and we’re driven by the knowledge that diverse talent enhances our ability to imagine, innovate, and grow.

I love working at Dolby.io because I’m surrounded by smart, creative, and collaborative people who create an atmosphere of community and inclusion.

Parastoo Emami

Sr. Program Manager

As a graduated college student, I was impressed at the effort the Dolby.io team put into helping me grow and develop as a young professional. Everyone on the team is eager and happy to help in an environment that is inviting and positive.

Braden Riggs

Developer Relations Intern

Solving exciting challenges alongside talent who value collective growth is highly enriching. Plus, there’s extra motivation knowing that our innovations generate exponential impact through facilitating collaboration and empowering creators globally.

Wendy Chen

DSP Engineer

I’ve had the chance to work with amazing people from all over the world. Particularly in this strange time, meeting developers using our platform to revolutionize the healthcare and education system of their country is why I love working at Dolby.io.

Fabien Lavocat

Staff Solution Engineer

I love working at Dolby.io because of the fast-paced, innovative culture, the meaningful work that challenges me to grow, and most importantly the people I get to work alongside. No day is the same with opportunities to dive into new projects.

Jessica Zhu

Developer Marketing Specialist

For a life-long technologist like myself, working at Dolby.io is both professionally and personally rewarding. I love our mission to bring the best audio and video experiences to life. My team is very talented, engaged and just plain old fun to work with.

Dan Zeitman

Developer Advocate

I manage a team of talented engineers developing new SDK features and the team effectiveness is amazing. Everyone on the team is goal oriented, but the atmosphere is friendly and the communication is open and honest.

Sebastian Rynkiewicz

Senior Manager

I love the work that I do at Dolby.io because I not only get to work with audio every single day, but I also get to share my passion for creating spectacular and impactful audio experiences with my teammates and the wider developer community.

Jaye Sosa

Media Specialist

Developer Advocate

Using Kotlin to Create Your First Audio Voice Call on Android with Dolby.io

Learn how to use Kotlin to build an Android application that supports Voice Calls.

Denize Ignacio

Developer Relations

Using Music Mastering on “Take Me Out to the Ball Game”

In this guide we explore how to algorithmically remaster the 1908 baseball anthem “Take Me Out to …

Braden Riggs

Developer Advocate

Go to blog Go to blog

Enjoy incredible perks and benefits*

Comprehensive healthcare

Medical, dental, and vision

Wellbeing

Variety of wellbeing programs to meet you where you are

Life insurance

Life and AD&D Insurance

Short- and long-term disability insurance

Stay financially protected even if you are absent from work due to a covered disability

Parental leave benefits

Parental leave and new child bonding time

401(K) program

401(K) with generous employer contributions (employer match and profit sharing)

Vacation

Generous paid time off

Holidays

11 paid company holidays and a company-wide year-end shut down

9/80 Schedule

Every other Friday off for most U.S. employees; other flexible work arrangements may be available too

Employee stock purchase plan (ESPP)

Buy Dolby stock twice a year, at a generous discount

Commuter benefits

Pre-tax savings account for commuting expenses

Tuition reimbursement

We’ll cover a portion of your continued education

*Perks and benefits may vary by location

Join the team

Land your next role at Dolby.io

Explore open roles Explore open roles

Keep a good thing going

Get the latest news, events, and product updates from the Dolby.io team.
